title: Fix live scoring update in APA rack scoring panel

requirements.text: Fix the score update logic in ApaRackScoringPanel so that the displayed scores for both players update immediately when any ball is selected (scored by playerA, playerB, or marked as dead)

quotes: The live scoring isnt updating as I select the balls

acceptanceCriteria: When a ball is clicked and assigned to playerA, playerB's score increases immediately on screen
When a ball is clicked and assigned to playerB, playerA's score increases immediately on screen
When a ball is marked as dead, both player scores update immediately to reflect the adjusted points
Score changes are visible without requiring any additional user action or page refresh

constraints: Only modify ApaRackScoringPanel.tsx or its direct dependencies
Do not change the Mark Dead Balls button styling (already fixed)
Do not change the defensive shot counter size (already fixed)
Preserve all existing functionality including ball state tracking, inning flow, and defensive shot counting
nonGoals: Altering the visual design or layout
Adding new features beyond the score update fix
